name: Nice To Meat You
description:
Nice To Meat You is a game for change that our small team of 5 made for a class project in our video game Licence in Montpellier.

Alessandro Legato - Project Manager

Remi Russery - Developper

Agnès Ruiz - Game and Sound Designer

Mickael Dellova - 2D Artist

Dilan Gurliat - Game Designer and 2D Graphist
